perk.name: psychic assault
perk.description: The technique lacks finesse, but by smothering and crushing the ego you can stun a thinking foe temporarily or scour and savage their psyche to break their mind and leave them hallucinating and psychotic, prone to lashing out at anyone around them friend or foe until they recover their sense of reality.

missText.text: You attempt to crush TARGET 's mind unsuccessfully
You exert your psychic pressure on TARGET but they resist you

hitText.text: TARGET 's mind is crushed by your mental assault
You suppress the mind of TARGET leaving them an empty headed simpleton

missText.text: You attempt to penetrate TARGET 's mind unsuccessfully
You exert your psychic pressure on TARGET but they resist you

hitText.text: You penetrate TARGET 's psyche and attempt to demolish her mind
You penetrate TARGET 's mind and attempt to shatter their sense of reality
